segments.text: That's the warehouse where the large items of office equipment are stored .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I ordered a desk today , how would it be before I got delivery in Scotland ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think perhaps you'd better speak to our Production Manager , Mr . Yao . You'll meet him when we go over to the factory .
segments.speaker: S1
